title: Surprise Party Fiddlesticks is listed a a legendary skin.

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
Surprise Party Fiddlesticks is 975 RP but it is listed as a legendary skin. I also looked at this on another account and I saw then same on that.

EDIT: I also noticed that Draven's Primetime skin is also listed as a legendary skin.

replies.body:
Yeah, because they are. Surprise Fiddle was a community idea and was set at a permanent discount and Primetime Draven was a "thank you" (aka buy more skins) from Riot for making a billion dollars USD profit through esports that year.

They're both way subpar for legendary skin standards today, as Primetime Draven was on release, but it's legendary tier purely because it has new VO lines.
Yup! These are both legendary skins permanently priced at 975 RP. ^-^
I've been waiting for Party Fiddlesticks to go on sale since forever. Does this mean it won't ever be on sale?

> [{quoted}](name=Empath Mechanics,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=vsdGT5V6,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-02-22T22:39:15.083+0000)
>
> I've been waiting for Party Fiddlesticks to go on sale since forever. Does this mean it won't ever be on sale?

It technically is on perma-sale. From 1820 to 975. 65 shy from half off. So you could say "Does this mean it will forever be on sale?", which the answer is yes.
I don't believe this particular skin goes on sale, besides the permanent discount.
Alright. Thank you very much. Guess I'll be picking it up.

Guess what is on the 50% discount this week  


{{champion:9}}  "Legendray skin"
